title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE FULL STORY
description:
6) hardie confessed, whole story (ruby leader)
7) drama white (ruby suspect)

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." She puts her coffee mug on..."
dialogueTree.text: "Okay." She puts her coffee mug on the table.

links.title: You: ""You said you studied *Oranjese lit..."
links.text: "You said you studied *Oranjese lit*. What is with this fugitive stuff?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I *did* -- I also had a side job s..."
links.text: "I *did* -- I also had a side job selling insurance that I was really good at. Got picked up by a bank. *Competitive intelligence*, they called it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""After that I sort of..." She smile..."
links.text: "After that I sort of..." She smiles. "Transitioned out of the whole culture scene."

links.title: You: ""What did you do to have these *peo..."
links.text: "What did you do to have these *people* after you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's not nice -- but it's not ille..."
links.text: "It's not nice -- but it's not illegal, not here in Revachol. Or even in Oranje."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What *exactly* did you do?""
links.text: "What *exactly* did you do?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Industrial espionage. I joined a b..."
links.text: "Industrial espionage. I joined a business collective with the intention of betraying them. I did my job well enough to be asked to do it again."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""With a bigger company -- the kind..."
links.text: "With a bigger company -- the kind you really, really don't fuck with. I took their ledgers -- two decades' worth of accounting."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I need the names of the companies..."
links.text: "I need the names of the companies involved. And who hired you." He taps on his notebook.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The job was Loosduin County Saving..."
links.text: "The job was Loosduin County Savings Bank -- they sound small but they're part of the Looskap conglomerate. That was the second job. The first was some printer company. You wouldn't know them."

links.title: Empathy: "But she *really* destroyed them. Sh..."
links.text: But she *really* destroyed them. She still feels it.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""As to who hired me for the job --..."
links.text: "As to who hired me for the job -- I don't know. But *they're* after me too. Along with Looskap, and their friends in the MI." She breathes out, heavily. "Once you're done in the competitive intelligence circuit, you don't have allies. You're radioactive."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Looskap -- these people engineer fi..."
links.text: Looskap -- these people engineer financial disasters in second world countries. The conglomerate also includes The Bank of Consecration, Eeirberg and the popular Pappa Lollo line of dairy products.

links.title: You: ""Pappa Lollo!""
links.text: "Pappa Lollo!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah. Pappa fucking Lollo wants to..."
links.text: "Yeah. Pappa fucking Lollo wants to kill me." She smiles.

links.title: You: ""I'm sure there are people who have..."
links.text: "I'm sure there are people who have done much worse than that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure. I'm not a war criminal -- bu..."
links.text: "Sure. I'm not a war criminal -- but it was bad. People lost their jobs. Good people too, not just C-Suite..." She shakes her head at the thought.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A lot of people got hurt," she con..."
links.text: "A lot of people got hurt," she concludes. "But that's just more of my shit you shouldn't have to deal with. You're solving a murder."

links.title: Empathy: "That can wait. Look into her eyes -..."
links.text: That can wait. Look into her eyes -- there's more.

links.title: You: ""What did you *do*?""
links.text: "What did you *do*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I..." She looks down, then into yo..."
links.text: "I..." She looks down, then into your eyes. "One of them killed themselves. Because of me."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She says it quickly. Like she's sai..."
links.text: She says it quickly. Like she's said it a hundred times -- to herself? To get used to the idea?

links.title: You: "Let's not pry. It's not part of thi..."
links.text: Let's not pry. It's not part of this case.

links.title: Suggestion: "Of course. This case takes preceden..."
links.text: Of course. This case takes precedence.

links.title: You: ""Serves them right. When I am king,..."
links.text: "Serves them right. When I am king, this Savings Bank will be first against the wall."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""This was not a joke. Real people l..."
links.text: "This was not a joke. Real people lost their jobs. Not just in the C-Suite either -- good people. What I did to get to accounting..." She shakes her head at the thought.

links.title: You: ""You're right. This is bad. You've..."
links.text: "You're right. This is bad. You've destroyed what people have built."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I am. I am a destroyer. People los..."
links.text: "I am. I am a destroyer. People lost their jobs -- good people. Not just C-Suite assholes. And the way I got into accounting..." She shakes her head at the thought.

links.title: You: ""That's a lot of shit you've gotten..."
links.text: "That's a lot of shit you've gotten yourself into."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It is. Many people lost their jobs..."
links.text: "It is. Many people lost their jobs. Not just C-Suite. Ordinary people. What I did to get to accounting..." She shakes her head at the thought.

links.title: You: ""Who did you do this to? And on who..."
links.text: "Who did you do this to? And on whose behalf?"

links.title: You: ""What *exactly* did you do?""
links.text: "What *exactly* did you do?"

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She takes a drag, then glances over..."
links.text: She takes a drag, then glances over her shoulder.

links.title: You: ""What happened here -- the night he..."
links.text: "What happened here -- the night he died?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""We were there." She points to the..."
links.text: "We were there." She points to the window -- the silhouette of the bed is visible. "Together. In bed, I mean."

links.title: You: ""Tell me *exactly* what happened.""
links.text: "Tell me *exactly* what happened."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay..." She takes a deep breath...."
links.text: "Okay..." She takes a deep breath. "He was in a kneeling position, he had just entered me. I was on my back, looking at him. I heard the window behind me shatter and I turned to look -- there was a hole in the glass..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I turned back to him." She breathe..."
links.text: "I turned back to him." She breathes out. A moment's silence. "His eyes were looking through me and his mouth was open, dumb... I could see... I could..."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A great pain moves through her, a d..."
links.text: A great pain moves through her, a dark and indefinite wave. She continues in spite of it.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I knew he was dead. Before he fell..."
links.text: "I knew he was dead. Before he fell down on top of me."

links.title: Empathy: "You were right. He *did* enjoy the..."
links.text: You were right. He *did* enjoy the moment of his death.

links.title: You: ""I knew he enjoyed the moment he di..."
links.text: "I knew he enjoyed the moment he died. I could see it in him."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""How?""
links.text: "How?"

links.title: Drama: "You asked her before if he enjoyed..."
links.text: You asked her before if he enjoyed it! She avoided it. How did I not discern it was a lie?

links.title: Volition: "You *know* how."
links.text: You *know* how.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He just had a hunch. Detectives ha..."
links.text: "He just had a hunch. Detectives have those sometimes."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Another hit. The lieutenant looks a..."
links.text: Another hit. The lieutenant looks at you -- in acknowledgement.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A direct hit. The lieutenant looks..."
links.text: A direct hit. The lieutenant looks at you -- in acknowledgement."

links.title: You: ""Just a hunch -- then what?""
links.text: "Just a hunch -- then what?"

links.title: You: ""I could see it in his eyes.""
links.text: "I could see it in his eyes."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She blinks. Everything is silent fo..."
links.text: She blinks. Everything is silent for a second.

links.title: You: ""So my feeling was right earlier. H..."
links.text: "So my feeling was right earlier. He *was* enjoying the moment of his death."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes, but... How did you know that?""
links.text: "Yes, but... How did you know that?"

links.title: You: ""The occult vision was right. He wa..."
links.text: "The occult vision was right. He was enjoying the moment of his death."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't..." She squints. "How did..."
links.text: "I don't..." She squints. "How did you know that?"

links.title: You: "(Better not to mention it.) "Then w..."
links.text: (Better not to mention it.) "Then what happened?"

links.title: You: ""Then what happened?""
links.text: "Then what happened?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""He was heavy. I pushed him off and..."
links.text: "He was heavy. I pushed him off and he fell to the floor -- there." She points through the window. "He only had his boots on. I bit the pillow... not to scream, then ran downstairs..." There's a long pause. She just stands there, her arms at her sides.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I waited for the second shot to co..."
links.text: "I waited for the second shot to come -- for me. I thought there would be one. It never came."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "She's forgotten about her cigarette..."
links.text: She's forgotten about her cigarette. The butt has burned right down to her fingernails...

links.title: You: ""Your cigarette, miss.""
links.text: "Your cigarette, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh..." She looks at it and quickly..."
links.text: "Oh..." She looks at it and quickly tosses the butt aside.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry this happened to you.""
links.text: "I'm sorry this happened to you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""So am I." She looks down. Her ciga..."
links.text: "So am I." She looks down. Her cigarette has singed her fingers.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What time was this? When did it ha..."
links.text: "What time was this? When did it happen -- it would help us if you could be as precise as possible."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""11.30 to 12.15. I don't know the e..."
links.text: "11.30 to 12.15. I don't know the exact time. Around midnight."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's okay." He makes a note. "We..."
links.text: "That's okay." He makes a note. "Were you inebriated?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Not as much as usual. He'd done a..."
links.text: "Not as much as usual. He'd done a line. Plus other things. I was drinking."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait -- Titus said she was gurning..."
links.text: Wait -- Titus said she was gurning her jaw off. Much more than usual.

links.title: You: ""Titus said you looked pretty high.""
links.text: "Titus said you looked pretty high."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yeah..." She tilts her head. "I..."
links.text: "Oh yeah..." She tilts her head. "I did one of his lines. Just to clear my head."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Good thinking. Clear your head. You..."
links.text: Good thinking. Clear your head. You should clear *your* head... get into his mindset.

links.title: You: "It doesn't matter. Better not to me..."
links.text: It doesn't matter. Better not to mention it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you hear or see the shooter in..."
links.text: "Did you hear or see the shooter in the course of this?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: You: ""What did you do then?""
links.text: "What did you do then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Nothing. I was trapped. I was stuc..."
links.text: "Nothing. I was trapped. I was stuck in my room -- downstairs. I got some clothes on and crawled back up, drew the blinds. Blood was coming from his mouth -- not a lot. Just a little."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""He was still on the floor. Slouche..."
links.text: "He was still on the floor. Slouched. I couldn't be there with him anymore. So I ran down -- and out of my room. Into the hallway. Down the stairs. I knew there would be people there."

links.title: Empathy: "Run, woman! Run past them and out i..."
links.text: Run, woman! Run past them and out into the street where it's dark and people move -- to the lorries at the intersection. As far as you can...

links.title: You: ""Why didn't you run away from here?..."
links.text: "Why didn't you run away from here? As a matter of fact -- why are you here now?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I already *ran*. I ran from an ent..."
links.text: "I already *ran*. I ran from an entire isola. There is... I can't run any further. Not with these people. This is as far as it gets."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She pulls on the cigarette, looking..."
links.text: She pulls on the cigarette, looking up at the sky. Her hair ripples in the breeze as she stands there, silent.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Of course. Keep your eyes open for..."
links.text: Of course. Keep your eyes open for the killer instead.

links.title: Logic: "Of course. Keep your eyes open for..."
links.text: Of course. Keep your eyes open for the killer instead.

links.title: Logic: "This doesn't fit with the testimony..."
links.text: This doesn't fit with the testimony of Titus Hardie. He said she was higher than usual.

links.title: You: ""Did you hear or see the shooter --..."
links.text: "Did you hear or see the shooter -- at any point?"

links.title: You: ""Were you inebriated?""
links.text: "Were you inebriated?"

links.title: You: ""What time was this?""
links.text: "What time was this?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She throws it away and immediately..."
links.text: She throws it away and immediately proceeds to light another one.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure you're not making thi..."
links.text: "Are you sure you're not making this up?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm not lying to you..." She looks..."
links.text: "I'm not lying to you..." She looks down, wincing. Her cigarette has singed her fingers.

links.title: Drama: "You *may* sometimes be bad at readi..."
links.text: You *may* sometimes be bad at reading her, but this time, truly -- she's telling you how it really went down.

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "That's a mother..."
links.text: (Shake your head.) "That's a motherfucker."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah, it was a real *motherfucker*..."
links.text: "Yeah, it was a real *motherfucker*... ouch..." She looks down. Her cigarette has singed her fingers.

links.title: You: "(Just nod.) "There are a few questi..."
links.text: (Just nod.) "There are a few questions I have to ask for my report."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks down with a wince. Her ci..."
links.text: She looks down with a wince. Her cigarette has singed her fingers.

links.title: You: ""You don't have to continue if you..."
links.text: "You don't have to continue if you don't want to."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No. I want to. Let's get this done.""
links.text: "No. I want to. Let's get this done."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's okay. Tell us as much as you'..."
links.text: "It's okay. Tell us as much as you're comfortable with." He waits for her to continue.

links.title: You: ""Alright. Tell me as much as you're..."
links.text: "Alright. Tell me as much as you're comfortable with."

links.title: Composure: "Her chest rises and falls with each..."
links.text: Her chest rises and falls with each word. She keeps herself together, and says it...

links.title: You: ""What happened after you ran downst..."
links.text: "What happened after you ran downstairs?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby went outside to talk to Titus..."
links.text: "Ruby went outside to talk to Titus and the boys. I was just... looking at Lely. In the bathroom. I had to put his clothes back on. His armour too. It was tough, but I've seen him take it off and put it on many times."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It took Ruby maybe half an hour to..."
links.text: "It took Ruby maybe half an hour to come back with Titus. I'd gotten him ready by then, they carried him out. I knew what they were going to do -- make it look like a hanging. Ruby said they would."

links.title: You: ""What did you do while they were ha..."
links.text: "What did you do while they were hanging him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby said to wait here. She also s..."
links.text: "Ruby said to wait here. She also said I wouldn't see her for a while; that we should lay low or something... so I did."

links.title: You: ""This Ruby -- where is this Ruby no..."
links.text: "This Ruby -- where is this Ruby now?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know. I haven't seen her s..."
links.text: "I don't know. I haven't seen her since."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will need to take this question..."
links.text: "We will need to take this question to the Hardie boys."

links.title: Logic: "Interesting. Why did this Ruby go t..."
links.text: Interesting. Why did this Ruby go through so much trouble -- to hide something someone *else* did? Look into this later!

links.title: Volition: "What are you doing?"
links.text: What are you doing?

links.title: Logic: "Coming up with a theory. She said R..."
links.text: Coming up with a theory. She said Ruby *knew* something was wrong before she said anything. How come? It was loud downstairs, she couldn't have heard the shot...

links.title: Volition: "It is ominous -- you already coming..."
links.text: It is ominous -- you already coming up with theories that put the blame on someone other than Klaasje.

links.title: Volition: "There is something suspicious about..."
links.text: There is something suspicious about that theory, but you can't put your finger on it.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sylvie was tending the bar." She l..."
links.text: "Sylvie was tending the bar." She looks down. "A lot of people were there. The Hardies were at the table in front of the stage, I think the Union box was full..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby was there too. They were havi..."
links.text: "Ruby was there too. They were having such a good time..." She pauses. "I sat down and they all welcomed me. I didn't even have to say anything, Ruby *knew* something was wrong."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Ruby?!"
links.text: Ruby?!

links.title: You: ""Before we continue -- who is Ruby?""
links.text: "Before we continue -- who is Ruby?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby. You know. The leader.""
links.text: "Ruby. You know. The leader."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The leader? Of what?""
links.text: "The leader? Of what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The Hardie boys," she says as if i..."
links.text: "The Hardie boys," she says as if it's self-evident.

links.title: You: ""I thought Hardie was the leader of..."
links.text: "I thought Hardie was the leader of the Hardie boys."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Well. Nominally yes. Ruby's the on..."
links.text: "Well. Nominally yes. Ruby's the one they go to when things happen. Like, things they need taken care of. She's the organizer."

links.title: Authority: "This Ruby, in her phrasing, is entr..."
links.text: This Ruby, in her phrasing, is entrusted with great power. She trusts her. So do the others.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Would you say she is the..." He lo..."
links.text: "Would you say she is the..." He looks at you. "Eighth Hardie boy?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Why not.""
links.text: "Why not."

links.title: You: ""Would you say she is... the eighth..."
links.text: "Would you say she is... the eighth Hardie boy?"

links.title: Suggestion: "Does she also *party* with Ruby, ho..."
links.text: Does she also *party* with Ruby, however?

links.title: You: ""Did you *party* with Ruby too?""
links.text: "Did you *party* with Ruby too?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No..." She smiles nervously. The b..."
links.text: "No..." She smiles nervously. The beads of her teeth shine.

links.title: Suggestion: "Still -- there is something there...."
links.text: Still -- there is something there. She won't tell you now.

links.title: You: "Better not to."
links.text: Better not to.

links.title: Suggestion: "What are you trying to be -- tactfu..."
links.text: What are you trying to be -- tactful? She wouldn't mind. Go on then...

links.title: You: ""Leader? Of what?""
links.text: "Leader? Of what?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's go on. What then?""
links.text: "Okay, let's go on. What then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Well, Ruby said let's talk upstair..."
links.text: "Well, Ruby said let's talk upstairs. I showed her the room... I've known these people since December, they know my situation. That I can't leave a paper trail. Ruby was the first one I told..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She said she'd take care of this...."
links.text: "She said she'd take care of this. It's what she does, you know. Take care of things. I helped her get the body to the bathroom -- we used a belt to pull him up under the shower. To keep him upright."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "To mislead you! They were tampering..."
links.text: To mislead you! They were tampering with the body.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To produce lividity matching a han..."
links.text: "To produce lividity matching a hanging?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This is concurrent with your doubts..."
links.text: This is concurrent with your doubts -- at the autopsy -- about the colouring being...

links.title: You: ""I knew it -- the colouring in his..."
links.text: "I knew it -- the colouring in his lower limbs looked faint."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""About half an hour had passed sinc..."
links.text: "About half an hour had passed since the moment of death?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods."
links.text: She nods.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were late. The marks would be..."
links.text: "You were late. The marks would be faint by that time." He makes a small pointing motion with his pen -- it's meant for you.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "In honour of another *precise* fore..."
links.text: In honour of another *precise* forensic observation.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You have it in you to be a champion..."
links.text: You have it in you to be a champion. Keep your head in the game now...

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "In honour of that *precise* forensi..."
links.text: In honour of that *precise* forensic remark, officer. A real hit.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She's silent. Just looks at her cig..."
links.text: She's silent. Just looks at her cigarette.

links.title: You: "Better not to remark."
links.text: Better not to remark.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This tactful approach will rob you..."
links.text: This tactful approach will rob you the glory, but hey, all I care about is angles and timetables. The loss is yours.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We *completely* missed the tamperi..."
links.text: "We *completely* missed the tampering. Looks like you got there in time. What was this -- twenty minutes after death?"

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Oops..."
links.text: Oops...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""About twenty, yes. Ruby explained..."
links.text: "About twenty, yes. Ruby explained it would make the blood... you know what it does." She looks at the ground. Then raises her light brown eyes to meet yours.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How could we have *missed* that......"
links.text: "How could we have *missed* that..." He shakes his head. "And when was the tampering -- twenty minutes after death?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a shame we never got around t..."
links.text: "It's a shame we never got around to doing a thorough autopsy..." He shakes his head. "And when was the tampering -- twenty minutes after death?"

links.title: You: ""Then what did you do?""
links.text: "Then what did you do?"

links.title: You: ""That's enough. I had another quest..."
links.text: "That's enough. I had another question."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She blinks, without averting her ga..."
links.text: She blinks, without averting her gaze.

links.title: Logic: "They tampered with the body to disg..."
links.text: They tampered with the body to disguise the cause of death.

links.title: You: ""You were tampering with the body.""
links.text: "You were tampering with the body."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes. Ruby said the blood in him......"
links.text: "Yes. Ruby said the blood in him... would look like a hanging."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No -- not just yet." He turns to t..."
links.text: "No -- not just yet." He turns to the woman. "Who is *Ruby*?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "*Let's go on*, what are you talking..."
links.text: *Let's go on*, what are you talking about? Did you forget how to cop? There's a new actor in the investigation -- change the question immediately!

links.title: Volition: "I can't restrain this one. The need..."
links.text: I can't restrain this one. The need to *cop* is too strong. You just need to ask it.

links.title: Logic: "I don't understand what you're doin..."
links.text: I don't understand what you're doing detective -- *go on*? A new name just emerged -- Ruby! This is important. Change the question immediately.

links.title: You: ""When it happened -- did you hear a..."
links.text: "When it happened -- did you hear a gunshot?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""When he was shot?" She thinks. "I..."
links.text: "When he was shot?" She thinks. "I may have. I don't know. I couldn't hear anything over the glass exploding."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The gunshot wasn't that loud? This..."
links.text: The gunshot wasn't that loud? This is something to keep in mind when assessing the distance of the shot.

links.title: You: ""Did you kill him?""
links.text: "Did you kill him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What?" She gathers the last vestig..."
links.text: "What?" She gathers the last vestiges of her strength. "Why would I put myself through this... insanity? Get myself cornered like this?" There's a silence.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The wind picks up. "He wouldn't hav..."
links.text: The wind picks up. "He wouldn't have died if it weren't for me -- I know that. But I would *never* hurt him."

links.title: Half Light: "Rage? Who knows the *dark currents*..."
links.text: Rage? Who knows the *dark currents* where lovers go?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "All kinds of *crazy* things happen..."
links.text: All kinds of *crazy* things happen when drugs are involved... sweet, sweet drugs.

links.title: Suggestion: "It could have been a *desire* murde..."
links.text: It could have been a *desire* murder. Maybe an act of jealousy?

links.title: Logic: "He was a serviceman. He must have h..."
links.text: He was a serviceman. He must have had a gun lying around. Close to her hand -- a  military weapon using *jacketed ammunition*.

links.title: Volition: "*Now* you guys suddenly have theori..."
links.text: *Now* you guys suddenly have theories pouring out? When they're obviously just stabs in the dark...

links.title: You: ""Downstairs people have this *crazy..."
links.text: "Downstairs people have this *crazy* idea that you killed him."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sad to hear that. They must ha..."
links.text: "I'm sad to hear that. They must have said it in some fit of frustration, or under pressure. They couldn't have meant it. I've talked to them after it happened -- *no one* has implicated me."

links.title: Half Light: "She's getting scared now. Of you --..."
links.text: She's getting scared now. Of you -- the downstairs people. All of it.

links.title: You: ""It's okay if you did it in self de..."
links.text: "It's okay if you did it in self defence."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I did not kill him to defend mysel..."
links.text: "I did not kill him to defend myself from rape," she says. "I told you before. That wasn't what happened."

links.title: Drama: "True, sire. 'Tis true."
links.text: True, sire. 'Tis true.

links.title: You: ""Who among us, having been in love,..."
links.text: "Who among us, having been in love, can say they haven't *thought* about it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What? Fucking themselves over for..."
links.text: "What? Fucking themselves over for no reason? This is not what happened, officer."

links.title: You: ""Desires drive people *loco*...""
links.text: "Desires drive people *loco*..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She simply shakes her head."
links.text: She simply shakes her head.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "She *has* the training for it. You'..."
links.text: She *has* the training for it. You've known it since she first greeted you. Here on this roof.

links.title: You: ""You *have* the training for it. I..."
links.text: "You *have* the training for it. I can see it in your posture, your shoulders..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The work I did -- they don't just..."
links.text: "The work I did -- they don't just send you in with no training. Corporate security is a thing. But I'm not a trained Sam Bo fighter, I've never needed it outside the gym."

links.title: Half Light: "She's fought outside that *gym* of..."
links.text: She's fought outside that *gym* of hers. That much is clear. Moreover -- she would like to do it now: hit you. It's in her shoulders...

links.title: You: ""Do you want to hit me right now?""
links.text: "Do you want to hit me right now?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because I'm under stress." Her mou..."
links.text: "Because I'm under stress." Her mouth is tense, the muscles in her feet tighten.

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because life is hell, officer," sh..."
links.text: "Because life is hell, officer," she finds refuge in her cigarette. It's thin, but it's something.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll try to make it less stressfu..."
links.text: "We'll try to make it less stressful, miss. But these are questions we *need* to ask."

links.title: You: ""Relax. One more thing.""
links.text: "Relax. One more thing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure." She nods and relaxes her ha..."
links.text: "Sure." She nods and relaxes her hands.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Samaran boxing, or Sam Bo. Graceful..."
links.text: Samaran boxing, or Sam Bo. Graceful martial arts stuff -- stealth, cleverness, and cool.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "Her shoulders do not shake, despite..."
links.text: Her shoulders do not shake, despite the strength it takes to keep herself from crying.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "She has the training for it. Two, m..."
links.text: She has the training for it. Two, maybe three years of self defence? Her body is hard and lean underneath that jump suit...

links.title: You: ""Drugs were an *integral* part of y..."
links.text: "Drugs were an *integral* part of your relationship. Perhaps they contributed to its end?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What does that mean?""
links.text: "What does that mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do drugs make you aggressive?""
links.text: "Do drugs make you aggressive?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No." She shakes her head. "People..."
links.text: "No." She shakes her head. "People don't take drugs to kill each other -- they take them to feel okay with each other."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I thought officers in Revachol wou..."
links.text: "I thought officers in Revachol would be more enlightened about these things." She looks you in the eye. "Especially since you've admitted to taking drugs yourself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a sideways..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a sideways glance.

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's not one of respect. You may wa..."
links.text: It's not one of respect. You may want to add a clever *retort* to this one.

links.title: You: ""I don't.""
links.text: "I don't."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course." There's a pause. "I'm..."
links.text: "Of course." There's a pause. "I'm sorry. I withdraw my statement. I'm under stress here."

links.title: You: ""Me and my drugs are none of your b..."
links.text: "Me and my drugs are none of your business."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry." There's a pause. "I wi..."
links.text: "I'm sorry." There's a pause. "I withdraw what I said -- I didn't mean to judge anyone."

links.title: You: ""I do drugs to keep working, cleani..."
links.text: "I do drugs to keep working, cleaning up this *shit* you've created here."

links.title: You: ""Clever retort.""
links.text: "Clever retort."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks at you, confused."
links.text: She looks at you, confused.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shares her confusion..."
links.text: The lieutenant shares her confusion. Respond with something professional, now...

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She takes a healthy -- nay, *giant*..."
links.text: She takes a healthy -- nay, *giant* healthy -- drag of her menthol cigarette, waiting for what's next to come.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I thought Revachol would be more e..."
links.text: "I thought Revachol would be more enlightened about this." She looks you in the eye. "Especially since you've taken them yourself."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I thought you Revachol people woul..."
links.text: "I thought you Revachol people would be more enlightened on this..." She pauses. "I'm sorry, officer. I'm under some stress here."

links.title: You: ""You know what I mean. Do drugs mak..."
links.text: "You know what I mean. Do drugs make you aggressive?"

links.title: You: ""He must have had a weapon nearby...."
links.text: "He must have had a weapon nearby. Did you use that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No. I specifically asked him not t..."
links.text: "No. I specifically asked him not to carry firearms when he was with me. He only had his stupid armour..."

links.title: You: ""The bullet in his head. It was jac..."
links.text: "The bullet in his head. It was jacketed. Military-grade. Who else here has a *military* rifle?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know. His friends have rif..."
links.text: "I don't know. His friends have rifles, maybe those psychos did it? Coalition military have rifles. I'm not a munitions expert -- and I did not shoot him."

links.title: Drama: "She might have been a tad disingenu..."
links.text: She might have been a tad disingenuous when she avoided talking about the bullet in his head *before...*

links.title: Volition: "Look who's waking up from a thousan..."
links.text: Look who's waking up from a thousand years of sleep!

links.title: You: ""You've lied to me about this bulle..."
links.text: "You've lied to me about this bullet before. When I said he was *shot*? You said you're *confused*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I've said I'm sorry. What more do..."
links.text: "I've said I'm sorry. What more do you want me to say? I did my best not to lie. It didn't always work."

links.title: You: "Better not start on this."
links.text: Better not start on this.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She pinches the filter of her cigar..."
links.text: She pinches the filter of her cigarette, hard. Then looks at you.

links.title: You: ""Okay. I'd like you to answer some..."
links.text: "Okay. I'd like you to answer some other questions, miss." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Like what?" She waits, her light b..."
links.text: "Like what?" She waits, her light brown eyes wandering... over the floor... over your face...

links.title: Logic: "He was a serviceman -- he must have..."
links.text: He was a serviceman -- he must have had a gun. Somewhere, lying around. Close to her hand...

links.title: You: ""Could the people after you have ki..."
links.text: "Could the people after you have killed him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's the first thing that went t..."
links.text: "That's the first thing that went through my head, when I heard the glass break."

links.title: You: ""And?""
links.text: "And?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I thought they'd found me. They've..."
links.text: "I thought they'd found me. They've killed him to punish me.... All last week I've tried not to talk to anyone, or be seen with anyone..." She looks at her cigarette.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""So they wouldn't be hurt. I've com..."
links.text: "So they wouldn't be hurt. I've come to understand, however -- this is paranoia. What happened didn't have anything to do with me."

links.title: You: ""But maybe it did?""
links.text: "But maybe it did?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I just don't know..." She shakes h..."
links.text: "I just don't know..." She shakes her head. "I don't know anything."

links.title: You: ""It probably didn't.""
links.text: "It probably didn't."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Or... I don't know anything anymor..."
links.text: "Or... I don't know anything anymore. All I do is wait here." She looks at the table.

links.title: You: ""Either way -- something to conside..."
links.text: "Either way -- something to consider."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't go after Looskap. Not yet..."
links.text: "We can't go after Looskap. Not yet. There are other, saner leads."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't ask you to, lieutenant. If..."
links.text: "I don't ask you to, lieutenant. If there's one thing I know it's that you'll get *nothing* from there."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""If there's one thing I know it's t..."
links.text: "If there's one thing I know it's that you'll get *nothing* from Looskap. They don't fuck things like this up."

links.title: Rhetoric: "*If they want to kill me, they'll k..."
links.text: *If they want to kill me, they'll kill me. If they want to toy with me they will*. She's come to this conclusion weeks ago.

links.title: You: ""Why did you call the cops if you'r..."
links.text: "Why did you call the cops if you're hiding?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because I'm an *idiot*." The answe..."
links.text: "Because I'm an *idiot*." The answer comes fast.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Which *is* an indicator of truth..."
links.text: Which *is* an indicator of truth...

links.title: Logic: "Idiot? She's nothing of the sort."
links.text: Idiot? She's nothing of the sort.

links.title: You: ""So you would have me believe. But..."
links.text: "So you would have me believe. But you're not."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You have to understand -- the peop..."
links.text: "You have to understand -- the people around here... No one was making the call, and he kept rotting. And then they picked his clothes off. And that little fucker threw stones at him..."

links.title: Composure: "Her jaw is clenched. Her throat mov..."
links.text: Her jaw is clenched. Her throat moves. It takes all her strength not to cave in and sob... once... just one time...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""He kept throwing stones at him for..."
links.text: "He kept throwing stones at him for *three days*. I could hear the *thud*, *thud*..." She shakes her head. "So I called you. I hope with all my heart it's not the last thing I do in Revachol."

links.title: Drama: "She definitely called the cops. Tha..."
links.text: She definitely called the cops. That was *task complete*. It could not hath been a *lie*. That is impossible.

links.title: Volition: "Oh god. That was a lie too. Who mad..."
links.text: Oh god. That was a lie too. Who made the call then?

links.title: Logic: "She did, of course."
links.text: She did, of course.

links.title: Suggestion: "Don't be *paranoid*, man. It's unbe..."
links.text: Don't be *paranoid*, man. It's unbecoming of a police officer -- and it makes you sweat.

links.title: You: ""I don't think so. Why did you do i..."
links.text: "I don't think so. Why did you do it?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not gonna disagree with you.""
links.text: "I'm not gonna disagree with you."

links.title: You: ""When was the window changed?" (Poi..."
links.text: "When was the window changed?" (Point to it.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Last week. Angus and Titus's broth..."
links.text: "Last week. Angus and Titus's brother -- I think he's called Tibbs -- took care of it." She takes a drag. "I told you I'm a horrible girl. I told you things break around me."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You should have another look at tha..."
links.text: You should have another look at that window after this -- reconstruct the scene. It's right there.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You should have a look at that wind..."
links.text: You should have a look at that window -- reconstruct the scene. It's right here, so near...

links.title: You: "In her bedroom, inside?"
links.text: In her bedroom, inside?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yes -- you see the glass sparkling..."
links.text: Yes -- you see the glass sparkling out of the corner of your eye...

links.title: You: "Not now..."
links.text: Not now...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Still you see the glass sparkling o..."
links.text: Still you see the glass sparkling out of the corner of your eye...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Last week. Angus and Titus's broth..."
links.text: "Last week. Angus and Titus's brother -- I think he's called Tibbs -- took care of it." She takes a drag.

links.title: You: ""I think we're done here -- for now..."
links.text: "I think we're done here -- for now." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods silently, then picks up th..."
links.text: She nods silently, then picks up the cold coffee and holds it in her hands.

links.title: Empathy: "Out of guilt."
links.text: Out of guilt.

links.title: You: ""That's bad. How do you live with y..."
links.text: "That's bad. How do you live with yourself?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't." She shrugs. "How do *you..."
links.text: "I don't." She shrugs. "How do *you* live with yourself?"

links.title: You: ""I do drugs.""
links.text: "I do drugs."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Drugs are good," she looks to the..."
links.text: "Drugs are good," she looks to the sea. "I also do those. I try to *bargain* with myself too."

links.title: Shivers: "Around her -- a drop in atmospheric..."
links.text: Around her -- a drop in atmospheric pressure. Not long from now it will get dark. And the air will start moving faster, circling the box she stands on...

links.title: Inland Empire: "She's already in prison here. For w..."
links.text: She's already in prison here. For what happened. And she is prepared to never leave. Even after his death.

links.title: Shivers: "Around her -- a drop in atmospheric..."
links.text: Around her -- a drop in atmospheric pressure. Not long from now it will get dark. The rain will come. And the air will start moving faster, circling the box she stands on...

links.title: You: ""I drink.""
links.text: "I drink."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I do that too, yes. It's unbelieva..."
links.text: "I do that too, yes. It's unbelievably effective. Especially when combined with cigarettes. And drugs."

links.title: You: ""I just try to smoke as much as pos..."
links.text: "I just try to smoke as much as possible."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That doesn't really work, does it?..."
links.text: "That doesn't really work, does it?" She has almost devoured the cigarette she lit. She looks at it sadly. "Not without a drink to wash it down..."

links.title: You: ""I'm a cop. What I do is *right*.""
links.text: "I'm a cop. What I do is *right*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""By bargaining then..." She takes a..."
links.text: "By bargaining then..." She takes a drag. "I do that too. It's not all that effective."

links.title: You: ""By not remembering a single god da..."
links.text: "By not remembering a single god damn thing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That would do the trick, yes." She..."
links.text: "That would do the trick, yes." She has almost devoured the cigarette she lit. She looks at it sadly.

links.title: You: ""I *don't* either.""
links.text: "I *don't* either."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""There you have it." She's already..."
links.text: "There you have it." She's already almost devoured the cigarette she just lit and looks at it sadly. "The way of the warrior."

links.title: You: ""That's..." (Shake your head.) "Not..."
links.text: "That's..." (Shake your head.) "Not easy to deal with."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""How do you deal with anything? It'..."
links.text: "How do you deal with anything? It's all just..." She looks at you with pleading eyes. "How do *you* do it?"

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Let's get back to what happ..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Let's get back to what happened here, okay?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The young woman looks at her cigare..."
links.text: The young woman looks at her cigarette -- with melancholy. It's almost gone.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, silently. She doesn't eve..."
links.text: She nods, silently. She doesn't even smoke, just picks up the cold coffee and holds it in her hands.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhm..." The lieutenant glances at..."
links.text: "Uhm..." The lieutenant glances at you -- then at the door.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He's thinking -- *are* we done here..."
links.text: He's thinking -- *are* we done here?

links.title: Volition: "...or should we arrest her? She's a..."
links.text: ...or should we arrest her? She's a flight risk and she lied to you -- she should be taken into custody.

links.title: Volition: "...or maybe you should take her to..."
links.text: ...or maybe you should take her to the station? For safekeeping. She *lied* to you. And she's a flight risk.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's thinking -- *are* we done here..."
links.text: He's thinking -- *are* we done here, or...?

links.title: Volition: "You're not done. She's a flight ris..."
links.text: You're not done. She's a flight risk and she lied to you -- wake up, man.

links.title: Drama: "No. That won't be necessary. Just l..."
links.text: No. That won't be necessary. Just leave her alone, she's been through enough. She doesn't need this... police brutality.

links.title: Volition: "This guy won't budge. You have to w..."
links.text: This guy won't budge. You have to wake  Multi-Face up -- forcefully -- if you want to continue pushing her.

links.title: Volition: "Multi-Face! I'm beginning to doubt..."
links.text: Multi-Face! I'm beginning to doubt your judgement -- are you sure you're not sleeping on the post? You have to wake this one up -- with force -- if you want to continue pushing her.

links.title: Volition: "You're not done. She *lied* to you...."
links.text: You're not done. She *lied* to you. And she's a flight risk -- wake up, man.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I understand." She puts her coffee..."
dialogueTree.text: "I understand." She puts her coffee mug on the table.

links.title: Composure: "Just like that. No resistance -- he..."
links.text: Just like that. No resistance -- her shoulders are slouched, her feet long and straight.

links.title: You: ""You don't look surprised. You were..."
links.text: "You don't look surprised. You were expecting this."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I knew there was a chance you'd ge..."
links.text: "I knew there was a chance you'd get them to tell you. It's what you do. You're the police."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She winces. "For what it's worth, I..."
links.text: She winces. "For what it's worth, I'm sorry for wasting your time."

links.title: You: ""You sent us on a run-around.""
links.text: "You sent us on a run-around."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know." She looks down for a mome..."
links.text: "I know." She looks down for a moment, hiding her eyes behind her bangs. "For what it's worth, I'm sorry. For all of this, for wasting your time."

links.title: Rhetoric: "This is good. Clear the air first -..."
links.text: This is good. Clear the air first -- between you two -- then move on to questions.

links.title: Volition: "No, it's not good. It's the opposit..."
links.text: No, it's not good. It's the opposite of that. This will let her dictate the terms of your...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Shush. I can't hear what she's sayi..."
links.text: Shush. I can't hear what she's saying.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Let the miss speak. She's tall and..."
links.text: Let the miss speak. She's tall and thin and tired -- a twig trying so hard not to break...

links.title: Volition: "Is it? Something is off here..."
links.text: Is it? Something is off here...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you knew we would find out even..."
links.text: "If you knew we would find out eventually -- why *did* you waste our time?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because of the Hardies -- I couldn..."
links.text: "Because of the Hardies -- I couldn't just dispense with them, they were only trying to help me." She looks at her feet. "Out of the shit I'd gotten into."

links.title: Authority: "Is she implying the Hardie boys are..."
links.text: Is she implying the Hardie boys are THE LAW?!

links.title: You: ""Hold on there. The Hardie boys are..."
links.text: "Hold on there. The Hardie boys are *not* the law -- I am."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know that. But the people around..."
links.text: "I know that. But the people around here -- they don't see it that way. And if I am to stay here I need to get along with them."

links.title: You: ""That's not a good enough reason.""
links.text: "That's not a good enough reason."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're right... there's more.""
links.text: "You're right... there's more."

links.title: You: ""More?""
links.text: "More?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You answer to the Coalition Govern..."
links.text: "You answer to the Coalition Government -- and, by extension, the *Moralintern*..." She reaches for a new cigarette.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Briefly glancing over her shoulder..."
links.text: Briefly glancing over her shoulder to the sea -- as she's done time and time again.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "A grand expanse of water reaches ov..."
links.text: A grand expanse of water reaches over the bay and to the horizon. Grey and pale violet in the morning light...

links.title: You: "What lies beyond it?"
links.text: What lies beyond it?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The pale. The Mundi isola. The Occi..."
links.text: The pale. The Mundi isola. The Occident. And then -- *Oranje*. The Old Old World.

links.title: Empathy: "The conference centres... the peopl..."
links.text: The conference centres... the people who are angry at her. Her past.

links.title: You: "Never mind..."
links.text: Never mind...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The light refracts. She takes out h..."
links.text: The light refracts. She takes out her lighter.

links.title: Shivers: "Where the cold oceanic expanse lies..."
links.text: Where the cold oceanic expanse lies -- and behind it, another world.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "A grand expanse of water reaches ov..."
links.text: A grand expanse of water reaches over the bay and to the horizon. Golden grey in the noon light...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "A grand expanse of water reaches ov..."
links.text: A grand expanse of water reaches over the bay and to the horizon. Wine dark in the evening light...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The grand expanse of water is barel..."
links.text: The grand expanse of water is barely visible in the darkness of the night. The horizon is there, somewhere...

links.title: Half Light: "What the fuck WAS that!?! You don't..."
links.text: What the fuck WAS that!?! You don't fucking answer to FUCKING ANYONE.

links.title: You: ""Is that why you're looking over yo..."
links.text: "Is that why you're looking over your shoulder? You're afraid of the Moralintern?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. "You share a database wit..."
links.text: She nods. "You share a database with them. You send people to their courts." She lights the cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Is this about the people you menti..."
links.text: "Is this about the people you mentioned, the ones who are *angry* at you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It is." She nods. "They're after m..."
links.text: "It is." She nods. "They're after me. And they have friends in the Moralintern -- some *are* Moralintern. If I show up in your records, officer, they will find me. They will..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happens if they do?""
links.text: "What happens if they do?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They will kill me, sir. If you fil..."
links.text: "They will kill me, sir. If you file my name -- take me in for questioning -- enter me into the Moralintern mill..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "There's a wince and a pained little..."
links.text: There's a wince and a pained little smile. "Well, then I'm fucked. For nothing. This murder didn't have anything to do with me."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Fucked? People after her? *Moralint..."
links.text: Fucked? People after her? *Moralintern* people? This isn't Oranjese lit!

links.title: Volition: "Here we go. For once you seem to ha..."
links.text: Here we go. For once you seem to have her off-guard.

links.title: Logic: "Actually -- this murder did have *a..."
links.text: Actually -- this murder did have *a little* to do with her.

links.title: Volition: "Nothing to do with her? You'll be t..."
links.text: Nothing to do with her? You'll be the judge of that.

links.title: You: ""What happens if they find you?""
links.text: "What happens if they find you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""They will kill me, officer. If you..."
links.text: "They will kill me, officer. If you file my name, take me in for questioning, enter me into the Moralintern mill..."

links.title: You: ""Is this part of why Oranje is a *b..."
links.text: "Is this part of why Oranje is a *bad memory* for you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. "I have people after me...."
links.text: She nods. "I have people after me. And they have friends in the Moralintern -- some *are* Moralintern. If I show up in your records, officer, they will find me. They will..."

links.title: You: ""Has this got something to do with..."
links.text: "Has this got something to do with you being... Miss Oranje '37?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She smiles, cautiously. "I wish it..."
links.text: She smiles, cautiously. "I wish it did. But sadly no."

links.title: You: ""What's going on? What did you do?""
links.text: "What's going on? What did you do?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Just business -- but *bad* busines..."
links.text: "Just business -- but *bad* business for some people in the Moralintern. If I show up in your records, officer, they will find me. They will..."

links.title: You: ""What's the RCM's involvement with..."
links.text: "What's the RCM's involvement with the Moralintern got to do with this?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You share a database with them. Yo..."
links.text: "You share a database with them. You send people to their courts." She lights the cigarette.

links.title: You: ""The RCM isn't the lapdog of the Mo..."
links.text: "The RCM isn't the lapdog of the Moralintern. You don't have to worry."

links.title: You: ""I don't answer to *anyone*. Mother..."
links.text: "I don't answer to *anyone*. Mother fucking anyone, butch."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think you meant to say *bitch* t..."
links.text: "I think you meant to say *bitch* there."

links.title: You: ""I thought I did.""
links.text: "I thought I did."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You didn't." There's a short pause..."
links.text: "You didn't." There's a short pause.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Until the lieutenant loses patience..."
links.text: Until the lieutenant loses patience: "What does our *limited cooperation* with the MI have to do with this?"

links.title: You: ""I know what I meant -- I meant to..."
links.text: "I know what I meant -- I meant to say *butch*, you have a problem with it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer. Regain control of yoursel..."
links.text: "Officer. Regain control of yourself." He turns to the woman: "What does our *limited cooperation* with the Moralintern have to do with this?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Wow. Someone has their testosteron..."
links.text: "Wow. Someone has their testosterone cranked up to neolithic. Let me just forcefully re-rail this talk for you, okay? Are you okay with that? Here we go..."

links.title: You: ""Cool. I'm satisfied with this expl..."
links.text: "Cool. I'm satisfied with this explanation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am not. There is more here, miss.""
links.text: "I am not. There is more here, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I sense you're being sarcastic. Ok..."
links.text: "I sense you're being sarcastic. Okay. The thing is -- you're on the payroll of the Moralist International..." She stops to fish a new cigarette out of the pack.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why *did* you waste our time then?""
links.text: "Why *did* you waste our time then?"

links.title: You: ""Why *did* you waste my time then?..."
links.text: "Why *did* you waste my time then? If you knew I would find out."

links.title: You: ""Why *did* you waste my time then?""
links.text: "Why *did* you waste my time then?"

links.title: You: ""You *lied* to us, miss.""
links.text: "You *lied* to us, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't lie. Not a lot. I've done..."
links.text: "I didn't lie. Not a lot. I've done my absolute best *not* to. I just..."

links.title: Drama: "'Tis true, the laedy hath tried to..."
links.text: 'Tis true, the laedy hath tried to avoid falsehoods.

links.title: Volition: "C'mon. She lied through her teeth...."
links.text: C'mon. She lied through her teeth. And you know it.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It was a mistake." She winces. "I'..."
links.text: "It was a mistake." She winces. "I'm sorry for wasting your time."

links.title: You: ""Chill. I'm the cool cop, remember?""
links.text: "Chill. I'm the cool cop, remember?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She cracks a weary smile. "I'm sorr..."
links.text: She cracks a weary smile. "I'm sorry for wasting your time. I should have known you'd... that you'd find out."

dialogueTree.title: Drama: "Who... what... Dear god, you've bee..."
dialogueTree.text: Who... what... Dear god, you've been lied to! She could have killed her lover and lied to everyone! She's not *candid* at all, she's smoke and mirrors and will-o-wisps!

links.title: Drama: "She probably didn't give you her re..."
links.text: She probably didn't give you her real name either -- why would she? Arrest her immediately, before she further entangles you in her *web of lies*!

links.title: Volition: "Take it easy. Don't overcompensate..."
links.text: Take it easy. Don't overcompensate with this *course correction*. Ask questions first...

links.title: Rhetoric: "Yes. Start at the top, choose at th..."
links.text: Yes. Start at the top, choose at the bottom, it's how we've always done it. No rush...

links.title: Drama: "See?!"
links.text: See?!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Take it easy. Start at the top, cho..."
links.text: Take it easy. Start at the top, choose at the bottom, it's how we've always done it. No rush...

links.title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, why..."
links.text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, why have we not *arrested* her yet?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There may be grounds here... At le..."
links.text: "There may be grounds here... At least for an extended detention."

links.title: Volition: "This bastion of willpower here -- h..."
links.text: This bastion of willpower here -- his watchmen have been sleeping too, you can be absolutely certain now. But he's coming around.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "A little whimper. The young woman h..."
links.text: A little whimper. The young woman hears you. She's looking around.

links.title: You: ""Devil woman...""
links.text: "Devil woman..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""What?" Her nails tap on the steel..."
links.text: "What?" Her nails tap on the steel railing, nervously. The sound of cold metal ringing under the wind.

links.title: Composure: "Her hand trembles. She's only prete..."
links.text: Her hand trembles. She's only pretending she didn't hear you say *devil woman*.

links.title: You: ""You know -- I think you *didn't* m..."
links.text: "You know -- I think you *didn't* make that call to the station."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I *did*." She takes a step forward..."
links.text: "I *did*." She takes a step forward. "What is this? I called your *desk*, or whatever it is. The numbers are all over town: 'Call 8-100-2 for Emergencies'."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""There was an older woman on the ot..."
links.text: "There was an older woman on the other end. It sounded like she was smoking. She took my complaint. She coughed."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That *is* the Emergencies Desk numb..."
links.text: That *is* the Emergencies Desk number...

links.title: Drama: "Anyone could know that, sire. By lo..."
links.text: Anyone could know that, sire. By looking around and calling the desk. I don't believe a single word she says!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What time did you make the call?""
links.text: "What time did you make the call?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thursday night. It was late. Some..."
links.text: "Thursday night. It was late. Some time after twelve."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods in your directi..."
links.text: The lieutenant nods in your direction: "It checks out."

links.title: You: ""Anyone could know the number. And..."
links.text: "Anyone could know the number. And that someone coughed -- it means nothing."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""But I know the *time* of the call..."
links.text: "But I know the *time* of the call too!" She breathes in. "I know I have not been 100% truthful with you, officers. But I *am* now."

links.title: Conceptualization: "She sounds like a sixth grader, apo..."
links.text: She sounds like a sixth grader, apologizing.

links.title: Empathy: "You sense a little hesitation there..."
links.text: You sense a little hesitation there -- or maybe even fear? The stress was on the wrong syllable.

links.title: Drama: "Welcome to the wake-up club, brothe..."
links.text: Welcome to the wake-up club, brother.

links.title: You: ""I *know* you didn't make the call.""
links.text: "I *know* you didn't make the call."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I did," she replies. Her little fi..."
links.text: "I did," she replies. Her little fists tremble...

links.title: Drama: "Very good, sire. She will never adm..."
links.text: Very good, sire. She will never admit to it, but we can *see* that she didn't.

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Okay.""
links.text: (Nod.) "Okay."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay," she repeats, her voice more..."
links.text: "Okay," she repeats, her voice more to the side of a cry than a sigh.

links.title: Half Light: "Why is she so *angry* then? If she'..."
links.text: Why is she so *angry* then? If she's so sorry?

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I can give you the *time* too, it..."
links.text: "I can give you the *time* too, it was late. After midnight. 12:20." She breathes in. "I know I have not been 100% truthful with you. But I *am* now."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She stands before you, holding her..."
links.text: She stands before you, holding her back very straight.

links.title: You: ""Your real name isn't Klaasje Amand..."
links.text: "Your real name isn't Klaasje Amandou."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree." The lieutenant turns to..."
links.text: "I agree." The lieutenant turns to her. "You wouldn't give us your real name -- not when people are after you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." Her voice cracks suddenly -..."
links.text: "Okay." Her voice cracks suddenly -- like there's a garrotte around her neck.

links.title: Half Light: "Tighten it. You've got her."
links.text: Tighten it. You've got her.

links.title: You: ""All out of lies now, huh?""
links.text: "All out of lies now, huh?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay, yes -- it's not." She's corn..."
links.text: "Okay, yes -- it's not." She's cornered. "It's not my name."

links.title: You: ""You admit to it!""
links.text: "You admit to it!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You log your work *every week*. It..."
links.text: "You log your work *every week*. It's *all* transmitted to COMINSUR. I couldn't just beg you not to enter my name... So I lied."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Like I lied before. Like I lied to..."
links.text: "Like I lied before. Like I lied to my employers. I have to lie *all the time*..." She looks at her hands, her fingernails are chipped white. "I'm so tired of it."

links.title: Endurance: "She's not lying now. She really is..."
links.text: She's not lying now. She really is very tired. Her metabolism is failing her, the afterglow of whatever narcotics she's been taking is wearing off.

links.title: You: ""Was the passport bullshit too? Tha..."
links.text: "Was the passport bullshit too? That passport you keep hidden?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, it's submerged in a plastic bu..."
links.text: "No, it's submerged in a plastic buoy on the coast, in the reeds. It just... doesn't say Klaasje Amandou. It says Annouk Meijer-Smit."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Falsified documents?""
links.text: "Falsified documents?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Passport and visa." She nods. "Giv..."
links.text: "Passport and visa." She nods. "Given to me by my employer. I can't even use them. My employer probably leaked the name -- Meijer-Smit -- to hurt me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why would they do that?""
links.text: "Why would they do that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't show up to a rendezvous...."
links.text: "I didn't show up to a rendezvous. They don't take that *lightly*." She rushes to explain: "I didn't show up because I was afraid they'd... do something to me. The job was finished -- I'm just a liability now."

links.title: Empathy: "She fears an arrest right here and..."
links.text: She fears an arrest right here and now. This has been an awful turn of events for her.

links.title: You: ""It's fake too?""
links.text: "It's fake too?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. "A fake passport and visa..."
links.text: She nods. "A fake passport and visa. Given to me by my employer. I can't even use them. My employer probably leaked the name to hurt me."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""Where is this buoy?""
links.text: "Where is this buoy?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""West of the boardwalk -- in the re..."
links.text: "West of the boardwalk -- in the reeds -- on the coast there." She points toward a clump of  ruins on the western horizon. "I put it there when I first arrived. Haven't been there since. I'm not sure I could even find it now..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's useless.""
links.text: "It's useless."

links.title: Shivers: "The wind rises. So do the hairs on..."
links.text: The wind rises. So do the hairs on your back. Somewhere West, small bubbles rise from a plastic ball floating in the water -- rusty, the colour of over-steeped tea.

links.title: You: "What's happening?"
links.text: What's happening?

links.title: Shivers: "Long, spindly arms are spinning the..."
links.text: Long, spindly arms are spinning the buoy around, turning it, inspecting it like a magic eight-ball, trying to find a way to snap it open...

links.title: Shivers: "NOTHING IS USELESS."
links.text: NOTHING IS USELESS.

links.title: You: "Shake your head."
links.text: Shake your head.

links.title: Shivers: "Long spindly arms spin the buoy......"
links.text: Long spindly arms spin the buoy... Oh, but it's all gone now...

links.title: You: ""West of the boardwalk, in the reed..."
links.text: "West of the boardwalk, in the reeds? I need to check this buoy out." (Accept task.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant makes a note of it."
links.text: The lieutenant makes a note of it.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're welcome to it. It's in the..."
links.text: "You're welcome to it. It's in the reeds northwest of here, past a broken sewage pipe. Right near the waterline."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're welcome to it. It's in the..."
links.text: "You're welcome to it. It's in the reeds northwest of here, past a broken sewage pipe. Right near the waterline."

links.title: You: ""Fine. Tell me one more thing." (Mo..."
links.text: "Fine. Tell me one more thing." (Move on.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course." She nods."
links.text: "Of course." She nods.

links.title: You: ""Tell me your real name.""
links.text: "Tell me your real name."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's Katarzine Alasije." The smile..."
links.text: "It's Katarzine Alasije." The smile on her face is timid -- almost painfully so.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's a Graad name -- Zsiemsk or Yug..."
links.text: It's a Graad name -- Zsiemsk or Yugo-Graad in origin -- not Occidental at all. Smells of motor oil, taiga, economic desolation, and rock music infused alcoholism.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It also makes *Klaasje* almost an a..."
links.text: It also makes *Klaasje* almost an allacronym -- for Katarzine Alasije.

links.title: You: ""Wait, Klaasje is an abbreviation o..."
links.text: "Wait, Klaasje is an abbreviation of Katarzine Alasije?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. "It was a sentimental thi..."
links.text: She nods. "It was a sentimental thing. I wanted to be more *me* here. This time. So I used my nickname."

links.title: Conceptualization: "A nickname -- who gave you this nic..."
links.text: A nickname -- who gave you this nickname, Klaasje?

links.title: You: ""Who gave it to you?""
links.text: "Who gave it to you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A teenage boy. A million years ago.""
links.text: "A teenage boy. A million years ago."

links.title: You: "I don't care."
links.text: I don't care.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Someone's angry... she's in trouble..."
links.text: Someone's angry... she's in trouble.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, Katarzine Alasije is not..."
links.text: "Hold on, Katarzine Alasije is not an Oranjese name, is it? It's not even Mundi. It's *Graad*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""My parents were Zsiemsk immigrants..."
links.text: "My parents were Zsiemsk immigrants, but I'm nationalized. Oranjese. All I remember is Oranje." She's silent. "Alasije is my father's name."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Of course -- she doesn't look like..."
links.text: Of course -- she doesn't look like an Oranjese woman at all. She's...

links.title: You: ""I should have guessed. You don't l..."
links.text: "I should have guessed. You don't look Oranjese."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I've always had *that* going for m..."
links.text: "I've always had *that* going for me. Oranjese women do not win beauty pageants at 14."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I've always had that going for me..."
links.text: "I've always had that going for me -- I only have the birthmarks of an Oranjese woman."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, nervously. Then pulls on..."
links.text: She nods, nervously. Then pulls on her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Finally we meet, Katarzine Alasije..."
links.text: "Finally we meet, Katarzine Alasije." (Proceed.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods. Her round eyes meet yours..."
links.text: She nods. Her round eyes meet yours. They seem moist from the wind on the roof.

links.title: You: ""I'll keep calling you Klaasje. "(P..."
links.text: "I'll keep calling you Klaasje. "(Proceed.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's cool..." She looks at the a..."
links.text: "That's cool..." She looks at the ashtray. Then up at you.

links.title: Empathy: "She doesn't feel like a Klaasje. Sh..."
links.text: She doesn't feel like a Klaasje. She feels like nothing.

links.title: You: ""I'll just call you Miss Oranje Dis..."
links.text: "I'll just call you Miss Oranje Disco Dancer." (Proceed.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You can call me whatever you want...."
links.text: "You can call me whatever you want." She smiles, too tired to laugh.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. (Proceed.)"
links.text: Say nothing. (Proceed.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I haven't said it aloud in such a..."
links.text: "I haven't said it aloud in such a long time... that name." She shakes her head.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's filling dead air. Can't stand..."
links.text: She's filling dead air. Can't stand the silence.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Could it mean *Klaasje* is an allac..."
links.text: Could it mean *Klaasje* is an allacronym? For Katarzine Alasije?

links.title: You: ""You're probably not even Miss Oran..."
links.text: "You're probably not even Miss Oranje '37, are you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I am." Her smile quivers. "They ca..."
links.text: "I am." Her smile quivers. "They can never take my sash and my sceptre from me."

links.title: Drama: "Yes they can! For *lying*!"
links.text: Yes they can! For *lying*!

links.title: You: ""Enough." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "Enough." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, her back straight -- read..."
links.text: She nods, her back straight -- ready for whatever is next.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ready for the damage. She knows you..."
links.text: Ready for the damage. She knows you're grilling her.

links.title: You: ""I knew it.""
links.text: "I knew it."

links.title: You: ""Good. You can tell me the truth.""
links.text: "Good. You can tell me the truth."

links.title: You: ""'Okay' what?""
links.text: "'Okay' what?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay -- it's not.""
links.text: "Okay -- it's not."

links.title: You: ""We don't need to do this." (Back o..."
links.text: "We don't need to do this." (Back off.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you." She sounds grateful."
links.text: "Thank you." She sounds grateful.

links.title: You: "(Now that Kim's here) "What if I to..."
links.text: (Now that Kim's here) "What if I told you you're under arrest, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Klaasje..." she repeats with a pai..."
links.text: "Klaasje..." she repeats with a pained smile on her face, her back pressed against the railing.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It was my first real boyfriend who..."
links.text: "It was my first real boyfriend who gave me that name. He never recovered from the shit we went through. Because of me."

links.title: You: ""Who was he?""
links.text: "Who was he?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Who was he? A boy. A student. It w..."
links.text: "Who was he? A boy. A student. It was a good thing and I destroyed him." She looks you in the eye, her mouth quivering.

links.title: You: ""Cute. You're still under arrest.""
links.text: "Cute. You're still under arrest."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know I'm shit -- I know. But I h..."
links.text: "I know I'm shit -- I know. But I haven't done anything. At least nothing illegal."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""But I haven't *done* anything..."..."
links.text: "But I haven't *done* anything..." She backs up against the railing -- with a forced smile on her face. "Anything *illegal*."

links.title: Authority: "Failure to aid a police investigati..."
