links.text: Failure to aid a police investigation.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She purposefully misrepresented inf..."
links.text: She purposefully misrepresented information crucial to the case.

links.title: Half Light: "Fucking *mind* games! Enough!"
links.text: Fucking *mind* games! Enough!

links.title: Drama: "That's right. Stern and merciless n..."
links.text: That's right. Stern and merciless now, STERN AND MERCILESS as we reel her in.

links.title: You: ""Failure to aid a police officer. Y..."
links.text: "Failure to aid a police officer. You have wasted our time -- in a time-critical investigation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant produces a pair of h..."
links.text: The lieutenant produces a pair of handcuffs...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Please, no." Her eyes become round..."
links.text: "Please, no." Her eyes become round with fear. She tries to back further off...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "...but there's nowhere to go. A two..."
links.text: ...but there's nowhere to go. A two-story drop to the plaza mosaic -- if she could, she would've run before.

links.title: Endurance: "Fragile, unshielded, her voice is t..."
links.text: Fragile, unshielded, her voice is thin and tired.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think I *know* who did it. Who s..."
links.text: "I think I *know* who did it. Who shot Lely... I can tell you. I can help you."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She knows something!"
links.text: She knows something!

links.title: You: ""What do you know? Who shot him?""
links.text: "What do you know? Who shot him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She's silent for a second -- as if..."
links.text: She's silent for a second -- as if looking into herself for certainty. Then, in a hushed voice, she says...

links.title: Empathy: "Gearing up for this betrayal is har..."
links.text: Gearing up for this betrayal is hard for her.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Ruby.""
links.text: "Ruby."

links.title: You: ""Kim, arrest this woman before she..."
links.text: "Kim, arrest this woman before she can say anything else." (Ignore her theory.)

links.title: You: ""You misrepresented information abo..."
links.text: "You misrepresented information about the case. Without the Hardies' confession we'd know nothing."

links.title: You: ""You're a flight risk -- and I've a..."
links.text: "You're a flight risk -- and I've already told you're a *suspect* in a murder investigation, remember?"

links.title: You: ""You're a suspect in a murder inves..."
links.text: "You're a suspect in a murder investigation. You're a flight risk. That is all the reason I need."

links.title: You: ""You're not playing these *mind gam..."
links.text: "You're not playing these *mind games* with me anymore." (Wag your finger next to your head.) "You're coming in."

links.title: You: ""Industrial espionage. We uphold in..."
links.text: "Industrial espionage. We uphold international law here in the Zone of Control."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You almost say the words, then stop..."
links.text: You almost say the words, then stop -- the lieutenant is off somewhere, 28 kilometres from here, probably reading the *manual* for incarceration. The one he *knows how to use*. Come back and say this with Kim here; you can't handle it without him.

links.title: You: ""What if I told you you're under ar..."
links.text: "What if I told you you're under arrest, miss."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about you and Ruby agai..."
links.text: "Let's talk about you and Ruby again."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods, then nervously pulls on h..."
links.text: She nods, then nervously pulls on her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Why do you think it was her?""
links.text: "Why do you think it was her?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She has this *thing* for me -- eve..."
links.text: "She has this *thing* for me -- ever since I met her and the boys downstairs. She's been pretty frank about what she wants..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What she's saying is -- sex?"
links.text: What she's saying is -- sex?

links.title: You: ""Sex?""
links.text: "Sex?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And more." She nods. "I made the m..."
links.text: "And more." She nods. "I made the mistake of confiding in her -- I told her I was on the run. She started *protecting* me. It became an unhealthy relationship."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""When I started spending time with..."
links.text: "When I started spending time with Lely," she says in a near-whisper, "she told me to end it. Said there would be *shit* if I didn't. It was not a good meeting. We stopped talking after that, but..."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Wait, wait, everyone -- just *wait*..."
links.text: Wait, wait, everyone -- just *wait*. What is this? Derail this whole thing immediately and *investigate*.

links.title: You: ""I don't understand. Ruby's a woman..."
links.text: "I don't understand. Ruby's a woman, right? It's a *woman's* name."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes." She nods."
links.text: "Yes." She nods.

links.title: You: ""Okay, now I understand. Yes.""
links.text: "Okay, now I understand. Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do not." He turns to her, the cu..."
links.text: "I do not." He turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What exactly about your relationship with this person made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: You: ""But... you're *also* a woman.""
links.text: "But... you're *also* a woman."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Women like women too, officer. Try..."
links.text: "Women like women too, officer. Try not to fixate on this. Let's move on."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Well, I'll be damned! That's one mo..."
links.text: Well, I'll be damned! That's one more thing we know about the world!

links.title: You: ""What do you mean, *like*?""
links.text: "What do you mean, *like*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I mean romantically." He turns to..."
links.text: "I mean romantically." He turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What exactly in your relationship with Ruby made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: You: ""I'm fixating on it, Kim.""
links.text: "I'm fixating on it, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't," he says and turns to her,..."
links.text: "Don't," he says and turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What -- in your relationship -- made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I won't fixate""
links.text: "Okay, I won't fixate"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He turns to her, the cuffs..."
links.text: "Good." He turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What -- in your relationship -- made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I understand now. Just clear..."
links.text: "Okay, I understand now. Just clearing it up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually -- I don't." He turns to..."
links.text: "Actually -- I don't." He turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What exactly in your relationship made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Before we do..." He turns to her,..."
links.text: "Before we do..." He turns to her, the cuffs still in his hand. "What exactly in your relationship made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't understand." The lieutenan..."
links.text: "I don't understand." The lieutenant sounds incredulous. He still has the cuffs in his hand. "What exactly in your relationship made you think she's romantically interested in you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She said she's in love with me. Sh..."
links.text: "She said she's in love with me. She even asked me to run away with her, when I told her I'm a fugitive. She started developing... *notions* about our relationship."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And you led her on?" The lieutenan..."
links.text: "And you led her on?" The lieutenant narrows his eyes.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A little. I was flattered, you kno..."
links.text: "A little. I was flattered, you know. But then I had to let her off and it was *not* easy. I came to regret being friendly with her." She looks at her feet. "We maybe kissed. Nothing more."

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes, but what was their relationshi..."
links.text: Yes, but what was their relationship *outside* this unequal power dynamic?

links.title: You: ""What was your relationship like? B..."
links.text: "What was your relationship like? Before this conflict?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""We spent a lot of time together. L..."
links.text: "We spent a lot of time together. Listening to the radio and such. She had great milieus. And she was good company. I was sorry it had to end..." She pauses.

links.title: Drama: "What was that question about? She's..."
links.text: What was that question about? She's feeding her friend to the wolves here.

links.title: Volition: "It also has startlingly little to d..."
links.text: It also has startlingly little to do with arresting her, you suddenly realize...

links.title: You: ""Sounds like she was fixated on you.""
links.text: "Sounds like she was fixated on you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is just an assumption.""
links.text: "This is just an assumption."

links.title: You: ""This is just sensationalism and gu..."
links.text: "This is just sensationalism and guesses."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know what it sounds like. That's..."
links.text: "I know what it sounds like. That's why I didn't want to tell you before." She raises her eyes to meet yours. "But she *knew* what had happened -- when I came downstairs."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Somehow she *knew* Lely was dead...."
links.text: "Somehow she *knew* Lely was dead. She wasn't surprised at all. When we came up here she was calm as a stone too. She cleaned it all up, like she had a... plan."

links.title: Logic: "This is a familiar theory. You had..."
links.text: This is a familiar theory. You had it too, remember? Could it be that Ruby was covering up after herself? The lynching...

links.title: Volition: "Yet again you're coming up with thi..."
links.text: Yet again you're coming up with this... The worst thing is -- it may be true?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "That is *a little* strange... peopl..."
links.text: That is *a little* strange... people don't usually keep things together under stress like that.

links.title: Logic: "Could it be that Ruby was cleaning..."
links.text: Could it be that Ruby was cleaning up after herself? That the lynching was a cover-up for *her* -- and she organized the boys to do it?

links.title: Volition: "It's ominous -- you buying into her..."
links.text: It's ominous -- you buying into her theory and running with it. Be careful with this Logic guy.

links.title: You: ""I don't know what to make of this.""
links.text: "I don't know what to make of this."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know what this sounds like. That..."
links.text: "I know what this sounds like. That's why I didn't want to tell you before." She raises her eyes to meet yours. "But she *knew* what had happened -- when I came downstairs."

links.title: You: ""And what is that?""
links.text: "And what is that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sex -- and more. I made the mistak..."
links.text: "Sex -- and more. I made the mistake of confiding in her -- I told her I was on the run. She started *protecting* me. It became an unhealthy relationship."

links.title: You: ""When Ruby said there would be 'shi..."
links.text: "When Ruby said there would be 'shit' happening if you didn't end your relationship with the deceased -- was she threatening you?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She came over one night. Drunk. Sa..."
links.text: "She came over one night. Drunk. Said she'd turn my life into a *living hell*. I've been threatened before, so I can tell when someone *knows* how to do it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And she's a pro. She must be. To k..."
links.text: "And she's a pro. She must be. To keep the Hardies in line. I tried severing ties with her after that. I thought it had worked, but..." She looks through the window of her room.

links.title: Half Light: "Some of that fear is still with her..."
links.text: Some of that fear is still with her. She exhales sharply...

links.title: Drama: "What are you talking about? She's a..."
links.text: What are you talking about? She's afraid you'll *arrest* her.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "No, wait! Look at her! Teeth like p..."
links.text: No, wait! Look at her! Teeth like pearls, face like a pebble -- she looks like a Twenties movie star. You can almost see her in Automatik Polychrome. Those posters in Ruby's lorry...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She was her type."
links.text: She was her type.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Look at her: teeth like pearls, fac..."
links.text: Look at her: teeth like pearls, face like a pebble -- she looks like a Twenties movie star. You can almost see her in Automatik Polychrome. Those posters in Ruby's lorry...

links.title: You: ""And *how* could she have killed hi..."
links.text: "And *how* could she have killed him?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You said there was a secret route..."
links.text: "You said there was a secret route there, right?" She points to the door that leads to the pinball workshop.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She could have come up through the..."
links.text: "She could have come up through there, then taken the shot -- right here, where I stand. It was too dark outside, I wouldn't have seen her."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Then slipped back downstairs withou..."
links.text: Then slipped back downstairs without anyone noticing? That *is* possible...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting theory. Did she know t..."
links.text: "Interesting theory. Did she know that door exists? Had you been out here -- with her?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes. She's been up here many times..."
links.text: "Yes. She's been up here many times. She used to come to drink on the roof when..." The young woman falls silent -- her mouth moves without a sound.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The peephole!"
links.text: The peephole!

links.title: You: ""What is it?""
links.text: "What is it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The peephole. My bed is right next..."
links.text: "The peephole. My bed is right next to..." She's forgotten her cigarette in the ash tray. "She would have seen us."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean to suggest -- she made it?""
links.text: "You mean to suggest -- she made it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No." She shrugs it off. "No -- why..."
links.text: "No." She shrugs it off. "No -- why would she do that to herself? No, I just remembered you told me about it, and..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She's not really sure. It *was* rig..."
links.text: She's not really sure. It *was* right above the bed -- she could have seen all sorts of things from there.

links.title: Drama: "Don't let your imagination run wild..."
links.text: Don't let your imagination run wild here, sire. Keep it on track.

links.title: You: ""You're thinking about the peep hol..."
links.text: "You're thinking about the peep hole, right? The perforation in the pinball workshop wall."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She would have seen us. My bed is..."
links.text: "She would have seen us. My bed is right next to..." She's forgotten her cigarette in the ash tray.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes, of course. She's been up here..."
links.text: "Yes, of course. She's been up here many times, jacking private stations off the ring antenna. She used to come here, to drink on the roof with me. Before it got... weird."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You've been through there, right?..."
links.text: "You've been through there, right? I saw you come out." She points to the door that leads to the pinball workshop. "It leads downstairs."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She could have come to the roof th..."
links.text: "She could have come to the roof through that, then made the shot right here, where I stand. It was dark outside, I wouldn't have seen her."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You've been trying to kick that do..."
links.text: "You've been trying to kick that door down, right?" She points to the barred door, next to the window. "Maybe it leads downstairs?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She could have come to the roof th..."
links.text: "She could have come to the roof through that, then taken the shot -- right here, where I stand. It was dark outside, I wouldn't have seen her."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""She could have had access to the r..."
links.text: "She could have had access to the roof." She points to the barred door next to the window. "You've noticed that door there, right? Maybe it leads downstairs?"

links.title: You: ""Okay. That's it for Ruby." (Wrap i..."
links.text: "Okay. That's it for Ruby." (Wrap it up.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." She looks relieved."
links.text: "Okay." She looks relieved.

links.title: Volition: "Okay? And WHAT?!?"
links.text: Okay? And WHAT?!?

links.title: Drama: "Arrest the liar! Now."
links.text: Arrest the liar! Now.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Why? She told us some pretty intere..."
links.text: Why? She told us some pretty interesting things there.

links.title: Authority: "Don't arrest her. Push her a bit mo..."
links.text: Don't arrest her. Push her a bit more but then let her off. That Ruby theory was solid. (And she's beautiful.)

links.title: Savoir Faire: "She's stuck here. She's already in..."
links.text: She's stuck here. She's already in prison -- look around! She's only trying to help you...

links.title: You: "Who?"
links.text: Who?

links.title: Volition: "Her! Stop letting her distract you."
links.text: Her! Stop letting her distract you.

links.title: You: ""That's all good, but I think we sh..."
links.text: "That's all good, but I think we should still take you in -- just in case." (Step a little bit closer.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""*Still...*" she says, her voice br..."
links.text: "*Still...*" she says, her voice breaking. "After all this. Sir, please... it's a shitty world and I know I'm shitty too, I know..." Her hand turns into a fist, slowly, crushing the cigarette she's still holding.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""But I don't deserve to be sent to..."
links.text: "But I don't deserve to be sent to the Moralintern and ground into paste just because I disturbed the *sanctity* of accounting. At some multinational..."

links.title: Drama: "She's gearing up for a last stand...."
links.text: She's gearing up for a last stand. This is it.

links.title: You: ""What do you deserve then?""
links.text: "What do you deserve then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know..." She throws away t..."
links.text: "I don't know..." She throws away the cigarette. "To spend my days with smoke and drink and dance -- wallowing in shit. Just like everyone else."

links.title: You: ""What *other* option do I have?""
links.text: "What *other* option do I have?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You have those *station calls*, ri..."
links.text: "You have those *station calls*, right? Where I have to show up at the station or I'll become a fugitive. You can write me one. You don't have to take me in right now... I promise I won't go out anymore, at night. I'll be right here."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know you can do that -- just let..."
links.text: "I know you can do that -- just let me come in on my own. In two months. Or maybe even one month. That's all I need..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You do have the form..." He looks..."
links.text: "You do have the form..." He looks at your ledger.

links.title: Volition: "That's it. I'm calling it. Kim is b..."
links.text: That's it. I'm calling it. Kim is beyond compromised.

links.title: Drama: "Definitely, sire."
links.text: Definitely, sire.

links.title: Drama: "By god, she's playing him too! Like..."
links.text: By god, she's playing him too! Like a fiddle, sire... Who would have known?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I do have a form..." He looks at h..."
links.text: "I do have a form..." He looks at his notes.

links.title: You: ""What will have changed in two mont..."
links.text: "What will have changed in two months? Or one month?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""*Everything* could change." She lo..."
links.text: "*Everything* could change." She looks around. "This city, the extradition rules... The people after me could be in jail. Or maybe Revachol..." She falls silent.

links.title: Empathy: "There is desperation there -- in th..."
links.text: There is desperation there -- in that silence. A cornered animal looking for a way out.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Maybe Revachol could be free? I co..."
links.text: "Maybe Revachol could be free? I could be tried in a free Revachol? An independent state that doesn't hand its detainees over to the Moralintern."

links.title: Shivers: "A free Revachol... There is a low,..."
links.text: A free Revachol... There is a low, distant rumble on the motor tract. A great machine, shaking the pillars down south. Electricity runs up your spine.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I find that hard to believe, miss...."
links.text: "I find that hard to believe, miss." The handcuffs jingle in his hands...

links.title: You: "What was that feeling?"
links.text: What was that feeling?

links.title: Shivers: "IT'S COMING."
links.text: IT'S COMING.

links.title: You: ""I also find it hard to believe.""
links.text: "I also find it hard to believe."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Don't. The world can change. It ha..."
links.text: "Don't. The world can change. It has changed before..." She looks at you, frozen to her spot.

links.title: Drama: "That's not the answer she was hopin..."
links.text: That's not the answer she was hoping for. Thought that you were some kind of patriot, or communard, did she?

links.title: Volition: "This was her last card. There is no..."
links.text: This was her last card. There is nothing more she can say. The final decision is yours -- you alone stand on the throne of your Mind.

links.title: You: ""I do like the sound of that... ano..."
links.text: "I do like the sound of that... another Revachol. Free. Independent."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The world can change. It's changed..."
links.text: "The world can change. It's changed before." Her round light brown eyes shining with tears.

links.title: Drama: "Her political overture has succeede..."
links.text: Her political overture has succeeded, we see?

links.title: You: ""Not on my watch.""
links.text: "Not on my watch."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay. Well..." Her round light bro..."
links.text: "Okay. Well..." Her round light brown eyes shine with the tears.

links.title: Drama: "The political gambit has failed."
links.text: The political gambit has failed.

links.title: You: ""This has got nothing to do with an..."
links.text: "This has got nothing to do with anything."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I know, but..." She doesn't know w..."
links.text: "I know, but..." She doesn't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""I've made my choice." (Decide what..."
links.text: "I've made my choice." (Decide what to do with her.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks at you in silence, her fa..."
links.text: She looks at you in silence, her face filled with fear, lips parted...

links.title: Logic: "Wait! If you arrest her, Kim will h..."
links.text: Wait! If you arrest her, Kim will have to transport her. You'd be without your partner for the rest of the day...

links.title: Drama: "SHUT UP! He's making a decision and..."
links.text: SHUT UP! He's making a decision and it's *his* to make.

links.title: You: ""Kim, arrest her before this drags..."
links.text: "Kim, arrest her before this drags out any longer." (Arrest her.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I will escort you to the motor car..."
links.text: "I will escort you to the motor carriage outside, miss."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "With a muffled whimper, she extends..."
links.text: With a muffled whimper, she extends her wrists. They're white, bony -- exposed below the rolled-up sleeves of her jumpsuit.

links.title: Half Light: "Waiting for your teeth and talons t..."
links.text: Waiting for your teeth and talons to cut into...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts the handcuffs away. "These..."
links.text: He puts the handcuffs away. "These won't be necessary. I will take you to Station 57 myself -- and slow the extradition process as much as I can."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It may be possible to stall it ind..."
links.text: "It may be possible to stall it indefinitely. But you *will* be safer there for the purposes of this investigation." He turns to you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can do this on my own. She's not..."
links.text: "I can do this on my own. She's not an immediate flight risk. See you tomorrow morning, officer. Downstairs, at the Whirling-in-Rags."

links.title: You: ""Let's write you a Station Call. If..."
links.text: "Let's write you a Station Call. If you miss it -- I can't help you anymore." (Write a Station Call.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I won't..." She takes the slip, sh..."
links.text: "I won't..." She takes the slip, shaking visibly. Then she collects herself.

links.title: Drama: "This may have been a *grave* mistak..."
links.text: This may have been a *grave* mistake, sire.

links.title: Volition: "Maybe. Maybe not. Mercy is rarely a..."
links.text: Maybe. Maybe not. Mercy is rarely a *complete* mistake.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I promise I will be right here all..."
links.text: "I promise I will be right here all the time -- nights too. I'll help you *any* way I can in this investigation and I *will* be at Station 41 in six weeks." She repeats. "I promise."

links.title: You: ""I'll let you off the hook -- for n..."
links.text: "I'll let you off the hook -- for now. Don't make me regret it." (Don't arrest her.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I won't, sir..." She exhales, shak..."
links.text: "I won't, sir..." She exhales, shaking visibly. Then she collects herself.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll keep you here, miss. Fo..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll keep you here, miss. For now." (Back off completely.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you." She cradles herself fo..."
links.text: "Thank you." She cradles herself for warmth. "Thank you. You won't regret it."

links.title: Volition: "Something tells you: you will."
links.text: Something tells you: you will.

links.title: You: ""Let's change the subject. For the..."
links.text: "Let's change the subject. For the time being." (Conclude.)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She slowly-slowly lights another ci..."
links.text: She slowly-slowly lights another cigarette and steadies her breath. As if in the presence of some tiger.

links.title: Half Light: "You *are*. This is not the end of t..."
links.text: You *are*. This is not the end of this.

links.title: Drama: "She probably didn't make the god da..."
links.text: She probably didn't make the god damn call either. And her name is not Klaasje Amandou -- why would she give her real name? Arrest her immediately!

links.title: Drama: "Look at her! Her hands, her nails,..."
links.text: Look at her! Her hands, her nails, the cigarette... Every second you stall, you become more entangled in this spider's *web of lies*. Arrest her immediately!

dialogueTree.title: Drama: "But we *are* awake, sire! She has b..."
dialogueTree.text: But we *are* awake, sire! She has been forthcoming -- with sordid details women usually conceal! Most *shocking* details of the sexual kind! We are a bulwark, un-breached...

links.title: You: "She was *confused* when I asked abo..."
links.text: She was *confused* when I asked about the bullet in his head. That was a lie.

links.title: Drama: "*Laedyfolk* do not know of such thi..."
links.text: *Laedyfolk* do not know of such things -- ballistics and weapons of war. She is too young and frail.

links.title: Drama: "You should stop staring at her and..."
links.text: You should stop staring at her and say something. This is costing you *credibility and power* in her eyes.

links.title: Volition: "It looks like this one's not waking..."
links.text: It looks like this one's not waking up. You'll have to do it without pushing her further. At least for now.

links.title: Volition: "This one's *still* not budging. You..."
links.text: This one's *still* not budging. You'll have to do it without pushing her further.

links.title: You: "I remember doubting she made the ca..."
links.text: I remember doubting she made the call she said she made. To the police.

links.title: Drama: "There iseth no doubt! The laedy cou..."
links.text: There iseth no doubt! The laedy could not bear the sight of her lover splayed and disfigured. A horrible story.

links.title: Suggestion: "Try not to sweat so profusely in he..."
links.text: Try not to sweat so profusely in her presence too. You'll blow your chances.

links.title: Drama: "Your paranoia is unflattering. She..."
links.text: Your paranoia is unflattering. She has been nothing but forthcoming and you're staring mutely into her face like a donkey!

links.title: You: "When I said the deceased *enjoyed*..."
links.text: When I said the deceased *enjoyed* his moment of death, she knew it was true. But she said nothing.

links.title: Drama: "Who hath told you these *lies*? She..."
links.text: Who hath told you these *lies*? She was merely confused by the esoteric arts you deploy in policework.

links.title: Drama: "Stop staring and say something dram..."
links.text: Stop staring and say something dramatic and professional!

links.title: You: "What was that about the semen sampl..."
links.text: What was that about the semen sample? She didn't like that topic...

links.title: Drama: "Seditious talk! That was not even O..."
links.text: Seditious talk! That was not even Our Wise Council, it was this shithead! This one. The next one.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Who, me? The lady is saintly, oh sh..."
links.text: Who, me? The lady is saintly, oh she sucks on the cigarette most elegantly. Stop staring, you look mentally handicapped.

links.title: Drama: "Okay, he's too busy doing something..."
links.text: Okay, he's too busy doing something else now. I meant Rhetoric. Anyway, don't listen to that guy -- we're right, she's saintly. Carry on.

links.title: You: "Just a proposition: *Could* the lur..."
links.text: Just a proposition: *Could* the lurid explicitness conceal something less sensational, but more... *illegal*?

links.title: Drama: "Who is this *personhood* picking th..."
links.text: Who is this *personhood* picking these seditious options? Can't you see the detective grows weary of your malcontent?!

links.title: Drama: "Stop staring at her eyes and say so..."
links.text: Stop staring at her eyes and say something pertinent to the case! This is making you look like an *amateur*.

links.title: You: "I got nothing. You're right, wise c..."
links.text: I got nothing. You're right, wise council. It is silly of me to imply she's lied.

links.title: Drama: "Gosh, she's so young, isn't she? Sh..."
links.text: Gosh, she's so young, isn't she? She would look spectacular in a *starring role*!

links.title: Drama: "Be careful not to look too long int..."
links.text: Be careful not to look too long into her soon-to-be-famous face, lest it make you look like an indecisive suitor.

links.title: Volition: "You've been breached, bulwark. You'..."
links.text: You've been breached, bulwark. You've been breached, like, a thousand times now!

links.title: Drama: "So you say! But give us one example..."
links.text: So you say! But give us one example of deceit -- just *one* example.

links.title: Drama: "If you have doubts, just give us *o..."
links.text: If you have doubts, just give us *one* example of deceit! Just one, and we will gladly change our minds.

links.title: Volition: "Get a hold of yourself just once, w..."
links.text: Get a hold of yourself just once, will you -- try and look past the *sexually* lax morals and do some police work.
